Thanks for playing~

Hope to see you again.

GoodBye!

The Player has to draw cards from a deck of cards.
The Player will be playing against a robot.
The Goal is to gather higher scores against the robot.
Each turn, the player will be drawing 2 cards.
The Player can choose to continue or stop after the cards are drawn.
When the Player chooses to continue, a new turn starts.
When the player chooses to stop, the Game will end and scores will be calculated immediately.

Scoring:

- Pair of Aces = 100 points
- Pair of K, Q, J = 50 points
- Pair of 10 = 20 points
- Any other pairs = 10 points
- Single Ace = 5 points
- No pair and No Ace = -2 points

Good Luck~
Hit [Play] to Continue or [Quit] to quit.
